posts.message:
ازاي ده بيتعمل؟

قصدي اذا كان ممكن تضيف بوكيمون للعبة في مكان  معين او تضيفه لسايت عالنت 
والناس تقدر تصطاده عادي بعد كده

للينكساوية اللي جربوا ssd disks
ممكن تقولوا لينا جربتوا brand و model ايه 
وهل فرق معاك ولا لأ فرق في ايه ؟
 بفكر اتهور واجيب واحد لكن بحاول افهم الفايده قبل ما اتهور

سؤال يا جماعه .. كام واحد هنا شغال او جرب يشتغل بــ React Native 
ولو انت مستخدمتهوش او ناوي تستخدمه فكر ف حل تانى لان فى مشكلة مش بسيطة فى الــ Core ممكن تخليك بعد شغل شهرين تلاتة ترمي الكود وتبدأ من جديد .
احنا اشتغلنا بيه وبعد شهر اتضح ان فى كونفليكت بين React reactivity system 
و React native  متعلقة ب setState بتضرب ال performance وف بعض الحالات بتكراش الابليكيشن كله 
المدهش بقا ان  react native creators نفسهم قايلين ان فى مشكلة وعاملين صفحة مخصوص ليها بدون اى حل ! :D https://goo.gl/Gih6M7
وبعد ما كان هيجيلنا شلل رباعى لان اشتغلنا كتير ومينفعش نرمى كل المجهود ده ف الشارع اكتشفت ان facebook اصلا وقف الدعم عن جزء كبير اسمه react native navigation بسبب المشكلة دى والمفروض انهم هيعملو حاجة بديلة .
فلو انت ناوي تشتغل بيه او كنت بتفكر ... توقف فورا علشان متلبسش لحد ما facebook يلاقو حل ليها
posts.caption: facebook.github.io
posts.description: A framework for building native apps using React

posts.message: I want to cash about 4000 object in client side ,  in a way that enable me to search in the fastest way..is there better way than saving them in js variable and looping..i think about localstorage but it seems to save string valus only which add one more step before searching..any suggestion or idea will be appreiated ..thanks

Please i need help i can pay for it i need it badly

 

We have a website (http://immobiliare.affariungheria.com). This site is work with Wordpress engine, so use php, xml, and a few html too.

The questions is how we can reach the following result?

1.

We have an agent contact form under every property page. Like u can see here: http://immobiliare.affariungheria.com/property/bauhaus-con-stile-a-budapest/ .

But I want that this form would be available only for registred users. When these users fill the form and click on the Send button we have to send the form to 3 different mailboxes. Now we can send to only one.

 

2. For this i attached a pic about backoffice of the site. We call it the riverse pairing. The consists of this the following:

The basis of the improovement is the Newsletter. The client make a registration to the site with a "Send me newsletter" option. Then he can fill and save an extended search form what type of properties he need.

When new property advertisement arrive into the database what is suit to the client’s needs in the backoffice appear 2 button in the row of the property (Porpose/Cancel) or only a checkbox. With these buttons the regional chief can decide that make a porpose to the client in the newsletter or not. In this way the chief can attache property offers into the newletter. When the chief selected every property what he want to send, click on an Attache button. At this moment in a pop up window appear the newsletter with the name of the client and some text why he get this letter, the links for properties maybe the feature image tumbnail and the client's search rules. For sure the client can unsubscribe from it. On the top of this popup we need a send button which would send the newsletter to 3 mailbox.
posts.caption: immobiliare.affariungheria.com
